column1: Little Goat Diner////The day-of coordination was handled by Tiffany who was absolutely perfect.  Really
column2: everything about the day and choosing things like menu items
column5: etc. was done with ease.  We did everything over email and Tiffany was kind enough to answer all of our questions in a timely manner.  Her and the team helped set up the space and it looked absolutely perfect with our decorations.  Service was wonderful
column7: and we had the best weather possible so we got a lot of use out of that wonderful terrace.  Our guests could not stop talking about how great everything was.
